book.synopsis: When Main Street in Lake Eden becomes a movie set, a clever killer rewrites the script, and bakery owner Hannah Swenson, while trying to decide which marriage proposal to accept, must sift through a cast of suspects before the film wraps with an even deadlier ending. Reprint.
